trans-unit.source: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Microsoft Windows Media Photo images.
trans-unit.target: 定义用于编码 Microsoft Windows Media 照片图像的编码器。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] is a new codec that provides better image fidelity than JPEG with smaller file sizes and more features.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] 是一种新的编解码器，提供比具有较小文件大小的 JPEG 图像保真度更高和更多的功能。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] images achieve lossy and lossless compression by using a single algorithm.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] 映像通过使用单一算法实现有损和无损压缩。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] images support existing metadata standards.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] 映像支持现有的元数据标准。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about this format, see [Windows Media Photo Specification](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/wmphoto.mspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关此格式的其他信息，请参阅[Windows Media 照片规范](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/wmphoto.mspx)。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] files do not support preview, global thumbnails, frame level thumbnails, or multiple frames.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] 文件不支持预览、 全局缩略图、 帧级缩略图或多个帧。

trans-unit.source: Encoding does not work in partial trust.
trans-unit.target: 编码不工作不在部分信任环境中。

trans-unit.source: See [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md) for information on partial trust.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[WPF 部分信任安全](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md)有关部分信任的信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder> to encode a new bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder>若要对新的位图图像进行编码。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the level of alpha frequency data to discard during a compressed domain transcode.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在压缩域编码转换过程中要丢弃的 alpha 频率数据。

trans-unit.source: The level of alpha data to discard when encoding the image.
trans-unit.target: 对图像进行编码时要丢弃的 alpha 数据级别。

trans-unit.source: The value range is 0 (no data discarded) to 4 (alpha channel completely discarded).
trans-unit.target: 值范围从 0（无数据丢弃）到 4（alpha 通道完全丢弃）。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Value
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> 值

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Description
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 描述

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term> 0
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term> 0

trans-unit.source: </term><description> No image frequency data is discarded.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 无图像频率数据将被放弃。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> 1
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 1

trans-unit.source: </term><description> FlexBits are discarded.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> FlexBits 将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: The image quality of the image is reduced without changing the effective resolution of the image.
trans-unit.target: 图像的图像质量降低，但不会改变图像的有效分辨率。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> 2
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 2

trans-unit.source: </term><description> HighPass frequency data band is discarded.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 高通频段数据将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: The image's effective resolution is reduced by a factor of 4 in both dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 图像的有效分辨率在两个维度上均将缩小为原来的四分之一。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> 3
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 3

trans-unit.source: </term><description> HighPass and LowPass frequency data bands are discarded.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 高通和低通频带数据将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: The image's effective resolution is reduced by a factor of 16 in both dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 图像的有效分辨率在两个维度上均将缩小为原来的十六分之一。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> 4
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 4

trans-unit.source: </term><description> The alpha channel is completely discarded.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 完全放弃 alpha 通道。

trans-unit.source: The pixel format is changed to reflect the removal of the alpha channel.
trans-unit.target: 像素格式将更改，以反映 alpha 通道的移除。

trans-unit.source: This property has an effect only if <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.CompressedDomainTranscode%2A> is set to `true` and the image contains either a planar or interleaved alpha channel; otherwise, it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 此属性具有效果才<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.CompressedDomainTranscode%2A>设置为`true`和映像包含任一平面或交错 alpha 通道; 否则，它将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The value given is not between 0 and 4.
trans-unit.target: 给定值不在 0 和 4 之间。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the compression quality for a planar alpha channel.
trans-unit.target: 为平面 alpha 通道获取或设置压缩质量。

trans-unit.source: The compression quality for a planar alpha channel image.
trans-unit.target: 平面 alpha 通道图像的压缩质量。

trans-unit.source: A value of 1 is considered lossless, and increasing values result in higher compression ratios and lower image quality.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为 1，则视为无损压缩；值越大，则压缩比越高，图像质量越低。

trans-unit.source: The value range is 1 to 255.
trans-unit.target: 值范围是 1 到 255。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: This property has an effect only if <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.InterleavedAlpha%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性具有效果才<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.InterleavedAlpha%2A>是`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether compressed domain operations can be used.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以使用压缩域操作。

trans-unit.source: Compressed domain operations are transformation operations that are done without decoding the image data.
trans-unit.target: 压缩域操作是无需对图像数据进行解码即可执行的转换操作。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if compressed domain operations can be used; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以使用压缩域操作，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to flip the image horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否水平翻转图像。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the image is to be flipped horizontally; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果水平翻转图像，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to flip the image vertically.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否垂直翻转图像。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the image is to be flipped vertically; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果垂直翻转图像，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to encoding in frequency order.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否按频率顺序进行编码。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to encode the image in frequency order; <see langword="false" /> to encode the image by its spatial orientation.
trans-unit.target: 如果按频率顺序对图像进行编码，则为 <see langword="true" />，则；如果按图像的空间方位对图像进行编码，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of horizontal divisions to use during compression encoding.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置压缩编码过程中要使用的水平分割数。

trans-unit.source: A single division creates two horizontal regions.
trans-unit.target: 一次分割将创建两个水平区域。

trans-unit.source: The number of horizontal divisions to use during compression encoding.
trans-unit.target: 压缩编码过程中要使用的水平分割数。

trans-unit.source: The value range is 0 to 4095.
trans-unit.target: 值范围是 0 到 4095。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.CompressedDomainTranscode%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.HorizontalTileSlices%2A> must be set to 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.CompressedDomainTranscode%2A>是`true`，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.HorizontalTileSlices%2A>必须设置为 0。

trans-unit.source: A tile created by the division can never be smaller than 16 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 按部门创建的磁贴绝不会小于 16 像素。

trans-unit.source: The value is adjusted to maintain the minimum tile size.
trans-unit.target: 若要维护的最小磁贴大小都将调整值。

trans-unit.source: When used in combination with <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.VerticalTileSlices%2A>, a grid of tiles is formed.
trans-unit.target: 结合使用时<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.VerticalTileSlices%2A>，磁贴的网格格式正确。

trans-unit.source: For example, if both properties are set to 1, the image is divided into 4 tiles.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果这两个属性将设置为 1，图像划分为 4 个图块。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to ignore region overlap pixels in subregion compressed domain encoding.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否忽略子区域压缩域编码中的区域重叠像素。

trans-unit.source: This feature is not currently implemented.
trans-unit.target: 当前尚未实现此功能。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if overlap is ignored; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略重叠，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This value is valid only when <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.CompressedDomainTranscode%2A> is `true` and a subregion encode is requested.
trans-unit.target: 此值是仅当<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.CompressedDomainTranscode%2A>是`true`和子区域编码请求。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the level of image data to discard during a compressed domain transcode.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在压缩域编码转换过程中要丢弃的图像数据级别。

trans-unit.source: The level of image data to discard during a compressed domain encoding of the image.
trans-unit.target: 在对图像进行压缩域编码过程中要丢弃的图像数据级别。

trans-unit.source: The value range is 0 (no data discarded) to 3 (HighPass and LowPass discarded).
trans-unit.target: 值范围从 0（无数据丢弃）到 3（HighPass 和 LowPass 被丢弃）。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Value
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> 值

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Description
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 描述

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term> 0
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term> 0

trans-unit.source: </term><description> No image frequency data is discarded.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 无图像频率数据将被放弃。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> 1
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 1

trans-unit.source: </term><description> FlexBits are discarded.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> FlexBits 将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: The image quality of the image is reduced without changing the effective resolution of the image.
trans-unit.target: 图像的图像质量降低，但不会改变图像的有效分辨率。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> 2
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 2

trans-unit.source: </term><description> HighPass frequency data band is discarded.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 高通频段数据将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: The image's effective resolution is reduced by a factor of 4 in both dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 图像的有效分辨率在两个维度上均将缩小为原来的四分之一。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> 3
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 3

trans-unit.source: </term><description> HighPass and LowPass frequency data bands are discarded.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 高通和低通频带数据将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: The image's effective resolution is reduced by a factor of 16 in both dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 图像的有效分辨率在两个维度上均将缩小为原来的十六分之一。

trans-unit.source: This property has an effect only if <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.CompressedDomainTranscode%2A> is set to `true`; otherwise, it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 此属性具有效果才<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.CompressedDomainTranscode%2A>设置为`true`; 否则为它将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The value given is not between 0 and 3.
trans-unit.target: 给定值不在 0 和 3 之间。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image quality level.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图像质量级别。

trans-unit.source: The image quality level.
trans-unit.target: 图像质量级别。

trans-unit.source: The range is 0 to 1.0 (lossless image quality).
trans-unit.target: 范围从 0 到 1.0（无损图像质量）。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.9.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0.9。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to encode the alpha channel data as an additional interleaved channel.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将 alpha 通道数据编码为附加交错通道。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the image is encoded with an additional interleaved alpha channel; <see langword="false" /> if planar alpha channel is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果用附加交错 alpha 通道对图像进行编码，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果使用平面 alpha 通道，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Interleaved alpha channels are only supported by certain pixel formats.
trans-unit.target: 交错的 alpha 通道仅支持某些像素格式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to encode using lossless compression.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否用无损压缩进行编码。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use lossless compression; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用无损压缩，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the overlap processing level.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置重叠处理级别。

trans-unit.source: The overlap processing level.
trans-unit.target: 重叠处理级别。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Value
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> 值

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Description
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 描述

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term> 0
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term> 0

trans-unit.source: </term><description> No overlap processing is enabled.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 启用不会重叠进行处理。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> 1
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 1

trans-unit.source: </term><description> One level of overlap processing is enabled.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 启用的重叠处理的一个级别。

trans-unit.source: Encoded values of 4x4 blocks are modified based on the values of neighboring blocks.
trans-unit.target: 将根据相邻块的值对 4x4 块的编码值进行修改。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> 2
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 2

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Two levels of overlap processing are enabled.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 启用两个级别的重叠处理。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the first level of processing, encoded values of 16x16 macro blocks are modified based on the values of neighboring macro blocks.
trans-unit.target: 除第一级处理外，还将根据相邻宏块的值对 16x16 宏块的编码值进行修改。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the compression quality for the main image.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置主图像的压缩质量。

trans-unit.source: The compression quality for the main image.
trans-unit.target: 主图像的压缩质量。

trans-unit.source: A value of 1 is considered lossless, and higher values indicate a high compression ratio and lower image quality.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为 1，则视为无损压缩；值越大，则压缩比越高，图像质量越低。

trans-unit.source: The range is 1 to 255.
trans-unit.target: 值的范围从 1 到 255。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation" /> of the image.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图像的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation" />。

trans-unit.source: The rotation of the image.
trans-unit.target: 图像的旋转。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the sub-sampling level for RGB image encoding.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 RGB 图像编码的子采样级别。

trans-unit.source: The sub-sampling level for RGB image encoding.
trans-unit.target: RGB 图像编码的子采样级别。

trans-unit.source: The range is 0 to 3.
trans-unit.target: 范围是 0 到 3。

trans-unit.source: The default is 3.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 3。

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Value
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> 值

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Description
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 描述

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term> 0
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term> 0

trans-unit.source: </term><description> 4:0:0 encoding.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 4:0:0 编码。

trans-unit.source: Chroma content is discarded; luminance is preserved.
trans-unit.target: 丢弃色度内容，保留亮度。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> 1
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 1

trans-unit.source: </term><description> 4:2:0 encoding.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 4:2:0 编码。

trans-unit.source: Chroma resolution is reduced by 1/4 of luminance resolution.
trans-unit.target: 将色度分辨率减少为亮度分辨率的 1/4。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> 2
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 2

trans-unit.source: </term><description> 4:2:2 encoding.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 4:2:2 编码。

trans-unit.source: Chroma resolution is reduced to 1/2 of luminance resolution.
trans-unit.target: 将色度分辨率减少到亮度分辨率的 1/2。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> 3
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 3

trans-unit.source: </term><description> 4:4:4 encoding.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 4:4:4 编码。

trans-unit.source: Chroma resolution is preserved.
trans-unit.target: 保留色度分辨率。

trans-unit.source: The value given is not between 0 and 3.
trans-unit.target: 给定值不在 0 和 3 之间。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates codec options are to be used.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示要使用的编码解码器选项。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if codec options are to be used; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用编码解码器选项，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.UseCodecOptions%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.QualityLevel%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.OverlapLevel%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.SubsamplingLevel%2A> are used in place of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.ImageQualityLevel%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.UseCodecOptions%2A>是`true`， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.QualityLevel%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.OverlapLevel%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.SubsamplingLevel%2A>代替使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.ImageQualityLevel%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.UseCodecOptions%2A> is `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.QualityLevel%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.OverlapLevel%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.SubsamplingLevel%2A> are set based on <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.ImageQualityLevel%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.UseCodecOptions%2A>是`false`， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.QualityLevel%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.OverlapLevel%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.SubsamplingLevel%2A>根据<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.ImageQualityLevel%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of vertical divisions to use during compression encoding.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置压缩编码过程中要使用的垂直分割数。

trans-unit.source: A single division creates two vertical regions.
trans-unit.target: 一次分割将创建两个垂直区域。

trans-unit.source: The number of vertical divisions to use during compression encoding.
trans-unit.target: 压缩编码过程中要使用的垂直分割数。

trans-unit.source: The value range is 0 to 4095.
trans-unit.target: 值范围是 0 到 4095。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.CompressedDomainTranscode%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.VerticalTileSlices%2A> must be set to 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.CompressedDomainTranscode%2A>是`true`，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.VerticalTileSlices%2A>必须设置为 0。

trans-unit.source: A tile created by the division can never be smaller than 16 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 按部门创建的磁贴绝不会小于 16 像素。

trans-unit.source: The value is adjusted to maintain the minimum tile size.
trans-unit.target: 若要维护的最小磁贴大小都将调整值。

trans-unit.source: When used in combination with <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.HorizontalTileSlices%2A>, a grid of tiles is formed.
trans-unit.target: 结合使用时<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapEncoder.HorizontalTileSlices%2A>，磁贴的网格格式正确。

trans-unit.source: For example, if both properties are set to 1, the image is divided into 4 tiles.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果这两个属性将设置为 1，图像划分为 4 个图块。
